name: trello
label: Trello
description: Trello is a collaboration tool that organizes your projects into boards. Trello tells you what's being worked on, who's working on what, and where something is in a process.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Trello server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: apiKey
fields.description: Key associated with API token for your account to access the Trello server and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: apiToken
fields.description: API token configured for your account to access the Trello server and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get a List
operations.description: Retrieve information about a List from Trello based on the list ID you have specified.

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ID of the list whose details you want to retrieve from Trello. For example, 6031cc2b75d8d78a5de7e3a8

operations.title: Get a Board
operations.description: Retrieves information about board from Trell based on the board ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Board ID
parameters.name: board_id
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the board. e.g. 602f2f91cc8a4e23e393556a
parameters.description: The ID of the board whose details you want to retrieve from Trello. For example, 602f2f91cc8a4e23e393556a

operations.title: Create a Label
operations.description: Creates a new Label on a Board in Trello based on the label name, color, and board ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Label Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the label that you want to create on the specified board in Trello.

parameters.title: Color
parameters.name: color
parameters.tooltip: Color for the label. Values are yellow, purple, blue, red, green, orange, black, sky, pink, lime.
parameters.description: The color to be set for the label that you want to create on the specified board in Trello. Supported values are yellow, purple, blue, red, green, orange, black, sky, pink, and lime.

parameters.title: Board ID
parameters.name: idBoard
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the Board to create the Label on.
parameters.description: The ID of the board in Trello for which you want to create the new label.

operations.title: Get a Label
operations.description: Retrieves information about a label from Trello based on the label ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Label ID
parameters.name: label_id
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the label. e.g. 603c6bd95984232d2a060953
parameters.description: The ID of the label whose information you want to retrieve from Trello. For example, 603c6bd95984232d2a060953

operations.title: Create a new Card
operations.description: Creates a new card in Trello based on the list ID, card name, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: idList
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the List. e.g. 6031cc2b75d8d78a5de7e3a8
parameters.description: The ID of the list in Trello in which you want to create the card. For example, 6031cc2b75d8d78a5de7e3a8

parameters.title: Card Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the card that you want to create in Trello.

parameters.title: Card Description
parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: The description of the card that you want to create in Trello.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields
parameters.tooltip: JSON field provided to enter other fields while creating the card. example, {"idMembers":"demomember"}
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields in the JSON format to be added to the card that you want to create in Trello. For example, {"idMembers":"demomember"}

operations.title: Get a Card
operations.description: Retrieves information about a card from Trello based on the card ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Card ID
parameters.name: card_id
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the card. e.g. 602f2f91cc8a4e23e393556a
parameters.description: The ID of the card whose information you want to retrieve from Trello. For example, 602f2f91cc8a4e23e393556a

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields
parameters.tooltip: JSON field provided to enter other fields while getting card information. example, {"attachments":false}
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields in the JSON format that you want to retrieve for the card from Trello. For example, {"attachments":false}

operations.title: Update a Card
operations.description: Updates a new card in Trello based on the card ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Card ID
parameters.name: card_id
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the Card. e.g. 603d90cff3a93a326781e5e1
parameters.description: The ID of the card that you want to update in Trello. For example, 603d90cff3a93a326781e5e1

parameters.title: Card Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: The new name of the Card.
parameters.description: The name of the card that you want to update in Trello.

parameters.title: Card Description
parameters.name: desc
parameters.tooltip: The new description of the Card.
parameters.description: The description of the card that you want to update in Trello.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.name: other_fields
parameters.tooltip: JSON field provided to enter other fields while updating the card. example, {"idMembers":"newdemomember"}
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields in the JSON format to be added to the card that you want to update in Trello. For example, {"idMembers":"newdemomember"}

operations.title: Delete a Card
operations.description: Delete a card from Trello based on the card ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Card ID
parameters.name: card_id
parameters.tooltip: The ID of the card. e.g. 603d90cff3a93a326781e5e1
parameters.description: The ID of the card that you want to delete from Trello. For example, 603d90cff3a93a326781e5e1
